assessments.status_rationale: No reporting today on new CISA KEV additions; the deadline is still in the future (2025-11-30).
No AAA national average gasoline price cited; tariff and inflation coverage does not provide the specific AAA print needed.
No mention of the October 2025 retail sales advance report result in today’s news.
No BLS PPI figure for October 2025 cited; without the numeric print, the outcome cannot be scored.
Blue Origin’s successful booster landing indicates launch activity, but the prediction’s window is 2025-11-21 to 2025-12-05; no count of FAA-licensed orbital launches in that window yet.
No OFAC SDN List update under the CYBER program was reported today.
Market coverage did not include a Cboe SKEW Index close at or below 120; no specific SKEW value was provided.
Articles note waning confidence in a December 2025 cut, but no CME FedWatch percentage close was given to verify a sub-45% reading.
The target window for high U.S. flight delays (2025-11-22 to 2025-12-01) has not started.
No announcement of a ≥600 MW U.S. renewable PPA by a hyperscaler appeared in today’s news.
